note:
Art in House is an auction house and art gallery run by art historian Anita Wolszczak-Karasiewicz (www.anitawolszczak.com). The picture gallery has existed since 2015 and at that time it became the second auction house in Poland in its market segment (according to the ArtInfo study).

Art in House cooperates with several hundred artists who through our agency have already sold over 2,000 of their works on the Polish market and abroad.
